es.upv.grc.grcbox.server.rulesdb

Class RulesDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.upv.grc.grcbox.server.rulesdb.RulesDB

  • public class RulesDB
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the core of the server, it may be split in several classes.
